President Trump liked Pete Hegseth 's idea for Greg Gutfeld to host next year 's White House Correspondents Dinner . And [ARG1: Gutfeld] [V: is] [ARG2: on board] . [ARGM-DIS: Well] , [ARGM-ADV: sort of] .
